body: "Faithful"... :/ @Ecchinosuke No, it's very much an NTR. Just because she's asking him(or us) if he(we) made female friends doesn't mean shit other than her trying to justify her unfaithfulness. Also, note the "!?" when she reveals her lovers...the boyfriend is obviously surprised by the revelation...so it's not an open relationship. Also, this is clearly an NTR story...it has all the trappings of one. She's literally been stolen from whomever is watching. The title is a big clue, too. "Faitful" is clearly used in an ironic capacity.
how can one be pregnant twice in 6 months?

You know I don't think this is NTR and here's why in the first page it's kind off implied that it might be an open relationship cause she said to the boyfriend "Did you make any female friends" not friends in general but females. Something else about this is that it looks like it's directed at us the viewers implying if we made friends with other hentai works God that's so META.
